name: The Vanishing Forest - Demo
description:
A group of scientists are sent to explore a forest that moves on its own. A puzzle game where you discover the story of the scientists who never returned.

One year later, one of the scientist's son goes back to the facility to find the truth of what happened, just to find the place abandoned - and inexplicably corrupted by the forest.

In The Vanishing Forest, you'll explore the beautiful and sometimes creepy world where not everything is where it seems to be, solve puzzles in order to traverse further into the abandoned Q-Corp laboratories while also uncovering what happened to the scientists who explored this forest before you.

This is a small demo of the still in progress game, we're still hard at work to always tweak and fix bugs and implement changes until the story of The Vanishing Forest is complete.

You can follow our development efforts on Facebook and Twitter!
